newsitem.title: USA: Westinghouse Australian unit in India rail venture.
newsitem.headline: Westinghouse Australian unit in India rail venture.

text.p: Westinghouse Air Brake Co said Wednesday that its Australian subsidiary, Futuris Industrial Products PTY Ltd, and Stone India Ltd have formed a joint venture to provide composition brake shoes for Indian railroads.

The venture, which is to be named Pioneer Friction Products with headquarters in Calcutta, will be 51 percent owned by Westinghouse Air Brake. The Indian railroads are in the process of switching from cast iron to composition brake shoes. Pioneer already has had its brake shoes approved by the Indian railroads, the company said.
It expects to begin full-scale manufacturing shortly.
